name: Drunk Chicken - The Well (Beta v1)
description:
This is a game/visual novel that was made as a test using RPG Maker. we have never made a game before, but it got funny, so we loaded it up with easter eggs and a custom soundtrack, and put it up for download to launch our game brand and hopefully distribute a laugh.

** WE KNOW THIS GAME ISNT FANTASTIC! BUT ITS FREE AND TAKES 5 MIN TO PLAY!

You awaken in a cave, with one path to go, i dont want to spoil it, so just go NORTH! ;)
